You can feel some creative pride when you look down on the watery wonderland you've made with these tools. But you may also wonder if it was worth the effort. As a newcomer to Planet management games, I've found this slippy sequel fiddly, cumbersome, and poorly explained.
Read more
articles.title: Planet Coaster 2 review: a good water park is hard to build

articles.author: Sophie Glass
articles.description:
Dragon Quest III HD-2D Remake's premise is bluntly, delightfully simple. The Archfiend Baramos, as evil as he is mysterious, is up and about. He’s got ill designs on the world. Your Dad tried to stop him, and he died. He fell into a volcano. We absolutely can’t be having that.
This is, more than anything else, a game about Going On An Adventure. Well walked ground, of course, but it’s rare to see it embarked upon with such barefaced delight, or such a wholehearted commitment to going the distance. It is a very big and a very simple RPG that is as wide as an ocean and as deep as a pond; a game to curl up with and play lazily and—with some sour caveats—enjoyably, for an entire winter.
Read more
articles.title: Dragon Quest III HD-2D Remake review: a world in the palm of your hand

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
I predict I likely won’t have fully gotten to grips with the strategy of Sultan’s Game for several more hours, but since I’m considering investing that time - after a morning spent card shuffling and deciding whomst to bone and whomst to murder in its Steam demo - I’m compelled to spotlight it. It’s deeply imperfect and willfully obtuse, but also absolutely fascinating. I’ll ground you with a slightly wonky and dull allusion to Cultist Simulator, then guide you through in more or less the order I experienced it. As we progress, you may feel steadily more disorientated. It’ll be like a brewery tour I’ve somehow inherited control of by murder-boning the previous owners. Onward!
Read more
articles.title: Sultan’s Game is a dark, fascinating, and irrepressibly horny oddity

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
A stupid inside joke I had with a housemate once was asking each other if we were "born in Chornobyl?" as a play on "were you born in a barn?" whenever either of us left the lights on before leaving the flat. This doesn’t make too much sense now I think about it, but such things rarely do. A more accurate jab, in hindsight, might have been "you been running S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl at full specs or something?", because based on the upcoming FPS’s new system requirements, you’re going to need a reasonably laissez-faire attitude to literally any other concern in your life that doesn’t involve acquiring a notably juice-guzzling rig.
Read more
articles.title: Here’s the updated system requirements for S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl, and it looks like a big’un

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
Correction: A previous version of this article implied that Tequila Works were the developers of The Sexy Brutale. In fact, it was originally developed by Cavalier Game Studios. Tequila Works are the publishers of the game and are also listed as "co-developers" on Steam. Very sorry for the mistake!
Original article: The studio behind sunny third-person adventure Rime has filed for insolvency, with the heads of the studio quitting their roles. Tequila Works had their funding from Tencent pulled at some point, according to Eurogamer Spain, leaving the company without an important flow of cash. Which may explain why they cancelled a game last month and laid off some of their workers. It now looks like that was just the first sign of a more serious problem which has sadly resulted in the dissolution of the studio.
Read more
articles.title: Tequila Works, the studio behind Rime and Song Of Nunu, has filed for insolvency

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
"Where’s my Neo-Volkite pistol, Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2?" was my perhaps slightly ungrateful reaction upon booting the action game up after the previous patch. "I didn’t even know what a Neo-Volkite pistol was until five minutes ago, but now this whole game is trash until I get one!." As promised in the roadmap, the last big update added a whole new Operations map, complete with a gargantuan new pseudo-boss in the form of a hierophant bio-titan. It did not, however, give me my beloved pistol. It’s fine. It’s in now, along with a few, less Neo-Volkite updates to other weapons.
Read more
articles.title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 patch adds a new weapon, plus some tweaks for the existing arsenal

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
After nearly a year of public beta honing, the Nvidia App – Team Green’s new one-stop shop for desktop GPU management – is out in full. Not alongside the upcoming RTX 50 series, as rumoured, but right-now-today-this-minute. I’ve been testing out the launch version and while it’s not without some dud features, it does agreeably achieve its stated goal of combining the functions within Nvidia Control Panel and GeForce Experience. And if installing it means never having to use the latter again, well, that’s 149MB well spent.
Read more
articles.title: The new Nvidia App is out now, justly banishing GeForce Experience to history

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
My strongest and most enduring memory of Grand Theft Auto will always be creasing into complete hysterics watching my mate pile into a crumpled police officer with a wooden baseball bat in GTA 3 after school one time. Young’uns these days just don’t appreciate how revolutionary it was to be able to hit a cop with a thing after he’d already fallen over. Suffice it to say I’ve got good memories of the open world series’ nascent forays into 3D, though never enough to tempt me into revisiting them, especially given the poor reception to Grand Theft Auto: The Trilogy - The Definitive Edition. I can sympathise. I’m annoyed just having to type a colon and a dash in the same game name.
If you’re in a similarly non-fussed position (I will never not be annoyed that ‘nonplussed’ doesn’t mean what it sounds like it should mean) I can’t imagine a lighting update that’s been available on the mobile versions for a while is enough to tempt you back. But what is a reporter's job if not pathetically treading water between chunklets of Grand Theft Auto news, upon the publishing of which Graham presses the button to release the nutritious pellets on which we all wholly subsist? I hope he doesn’t read that last sentence. I don’t get my pellet if the syntax becomes too convoluted. Moving swiftly on.
Read more
articles.title: Grand Theft Auto: The Definitive Edition trilogy on PC gets a classic lighting update from the mobile version

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
The developers of hero shooter Overwatch 2 must have dropped a box full of old photographs while clearing the attic, spilling old snapshots of Route 66 onto the floor and getting snared in a nostalgic daze. The game is launching a "Classic" mode today that will let you play the first-person payload pusher as it (mostly) was back in 2016 when the first Overwatch launched. That means 6v6 fights, the original abilities of its heroes, and no limits to stop the entire team picking the same character.
Read more
articles.title: Overwatch 2 is getting a "Classic" mode that restores the shooter to how it was in 2016

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Here’s a Steam quote for you: ‘The Rise Of The Golden Idol is the best game I’ve ever played where I spent most of my time staring at the screen going “well what chuffing well is it, then?!” Fiendish but fair, this detective puzzler demands a heady mix of observation, deduction, and logic, but rewards you with a progressively engaging story, and steadily more infuriatingly brilliant puzzles. Despite teaching you everything you need to know in the tutorial, it still manages to introduce new wrinkles and twists on the formula with each fresh chapter. My verdict? Imagine me lying my floor, massaging my temple with one hand and giving a fat thumbs up with the other.
Read more
articles.title: The Rise Of The Golden Idol review: fiendish but fair detective puzzling whose mystery you’ll want to unravel

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
"Imagine you buy a pinball machine, and years later, you enter your den to go play it, only to discover that all the paddles are missing, the pinball and bumpers are gone, and the monitor that proudly displayed your unassailable high score is removed". As reported by Polygon, that's an argument put forth by a new lawsuit against Ubisoft, filed by two Californian players of The Crew. They're suing the company in a proposed class action lawsuit over shutting down the racing game's servers, rendering it unplayable.
Read more
articles.title: Ubisoft is being sued over The Crew in a lawsuit that compares the server shutdown to a bumperless pinball machine

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Sin enjoyed the roguelike stylings of Dungeons of Blood and Dream when she played it in early access back in July, calling it a “baffling, bizarre thing that lives on the border of janky, retro, and punk”. As of yesterday, it’s now out for realsies, promising psychedelic dungeon crawling, the stabbing of assorted gribblies, and lots of little details that make you go “ooo, that’s nice. I’m glad they put that in there.”
Read more
articles.title: King’s Field with a bird RPG Dungeons of Blood and Dream is out in 1.0 now

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
The developers who remade Half-Life as Black Mesa are working on a new roguelite co-op shooter. It will feature no physicists celebrating Bring Your Shotgun To Work Day, but instead let up to four players tactically breach oil rigs and airports occupied by corporate-sponsored mercenaries. In Rogue Point the richest CEO on earth has croaked it, causing various megacorps to compete in a violent bum rush for control of that wealth. Which is where your team of renegade shooterists come in. They don't want to win this contest, they just want everyone else to lose.
Read more
articles.title: Rogue Point is a door-kicking co-op shooter from Black Mesa studio

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
The Steam Deck OLED – which is like a Steam Deck but better in almost every way – is getting a new, if potentially more smudge-susceptible Limited Edition. A successor to the translucent version that only went on sale in the US and Canada last year, the Steam Deck OLED: Limited Edition White offers both a snowy look and, for those of us outside North America, the chance to actually buy one. It’ll go on sale November 18th, in all the countries that the Steam Deck currently ships in.
Read more
articles.title: The next limited-edition Steam Deck OLED comes in white, and will be available globally this time

articles.author: Rachel Watts
articles.description:
Great God Grove is, in a word, bonkers. I’ve stopped a small community from completing a blood ritual, played the role of matchmaker to a group of lonely hearts that involved organising a date with god, and plastered a statue with paint as part of a revolutionary movement to uplift the power of art. My time with GGG has been a pick n’ mix of colourful escapades, and together with its story of godly woes, striking art style, vacuum-based puzzle-solving, and nightmare-inducing puppet work, I’m now a die-hard LimboLane devotee.
Read more
articles.title: Great God Grove review: play mail carrier and god wrangler in this wonderfully weird puzzle adventure

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
"A lot of puzzle games can leave you staring at the same static screen for ages, but here, I’m always pushing you forward," says Mark Brown of Game Maker’s Toolkit. For a decade now, Brown has been releasing accessible deep dives on game design for his popular YouTube channel, like "How Game Designers Protect Players From Themselves" and "The Two Types of Random in Game Design." This week, he’s releasing his own for the first time.
Read more
articles.title: How ten years of Game Maker’s Toolkit’s design analysis informed Mind Over Magnet

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
It was the 20-year anniversary of Halo 2 at the weekend, which saw the shooter's modern counterparts celebrating with classic multiplayer maps and long-lost levels. But also emerging from the dust of time are insights to the sequel's development back in 2004. Rolling Stone interviewed two key designers of the game and made a fun discovery. The Flood (the sickly pale alien infestation that briefly turns Halo into sci-fi horror) was partly inspired by a colourful and innocent children's book about a nice elephant.
Read more
articles.title: Halo's most disgusting enemy was partly inspired by a children's book

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Update:
 The full list is now live as promised.
The RPS 100 is our list of the best games to play on PC. It encompasses the full breadth and width of PC gaming stretching back to 1873, but focuses solely on those games that remain great to play today. It's updated yearly by our crack team of writers, and the first half of the 2024 edition is live now.

 
Read more
articles.title: The RPS 100: 2024 Edition is here, with our picks for the best PC games ever made

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Let’s try and get you up to speed on the fascinating oddity that is simulation game Ecosystem, on the off chance that Nate's coverage of it hasn't stuck with you like an unwelcome brain parasite you’re nonetheless unwilling to get removed for fear of the lingering emptiness it might cause (he once described an eel as “a quaver with erectile dysfunction”). Broadly speaking, this game is Spore’s evolutionary-biology-degree-having cousin. It’s been in early access for about three years now, but with the latest "Crustacean" update, it’s just hit 1.0. Once again, carcinization has come for all things.
Read more
articles.title: Deep sea evolution simulator Ecosystem gives each creature its own synthetic DNA, and it’s out now after years in early access

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Good news, everyone: I'm off work all this week. I know, I know - a whole seven days with zero Edwin bullshit. What a prospect. Allow yourself a moment to savour the idea. I'm so thrilled for you! The Maw, sadly, does not understand the concept of "time off". Its hunger is as constant as the tide, as unrelenting as my retreating hairline. So before I disappear into a beam of sunshine, here's this week's list of new PC game releases.
 Read more
articles.title: The Maw: what's new in PC games this week?

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
My brain is still thawing for the comment freeze, and thus there is sadly no cool industry person to talk to us about books this week. I'm currently reading Tony Tulathimutte’s Rejection. Jia Tolentino wrote about it for the New Yorker. Jia Tolentino also writes very good books. But enough about books, tell me about books! One's you've read, preferably, but I will also accept books you've formed opinions on based on their covers, as is good and proper. Book for now! 
 Read more
articles.title: What's on your bookshelf?: Liminal biscuit filling edition

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
November 8th, 2005 was my first day as a full-time games journalist, which means I have now entered my 20th year of doing this. "This" has changed a lot over time: from producing CD and DVD coverdiscs, to writing for a magazine, to editing magazines and a website, to solely editing a website, to managing several websites. Sprinkle podcasts, videos, events and a lot of other things in there and "games journalist" doesn't really cover it. 

One of the only constants is that I read a lot of writing about video games. 

Dapper gent Oli Welsh wrote for Polygon about the fan reboot of City Of Heroes. We briefly covered fans getting an official license earlier this year, but Oli went and spoke to the folks making it all work.

 
Read more
articles.title: The Sunday Papers

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
The Rise Of The Golden Idol will crack its new case wide open on November 12th, but the detective sequel is just the beginning. Color Gray Games are planning another tranche of DLC akin to that received by the first game, The Case Of The Golden Idol: four standalone mysteries that introduce more mysteries to solve.

 
Read more
articles.title: Rise Of The Golden Idol launches November 12th, with four DLC planned in 2025

articles.author: Ollie Toms
articles.description:
Alright everyone, let's put this new comments section through its paces. I want to hear deep and detailed roundups of everything you've been playing over the past two weeks this time! We're gonna make our tech team weep. Here's what we're clicking on this weekend!
 Read more
articles.title: What are we all playing this weekend?

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics Of War developers Proxy Studios have just released Zephon, a new 4X strategy game set in a manky, post-apocalyptic world. It's got hexagonal maps, flesh trees, gangly Evangelion-grade giants, "otherworldly hymns of decay", nuclear bombs, and a player-led "blend of magic and cyberpunk" that extends from the city architecture to the research component. All of which is my cup of giblets. Here's the launch trailer.
 Read more
articles.title: Choose between cyberpunk and magic in Zephon, the new 4X from the Warhammer 40,000 – Gladius devs

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Warframe developers Digital Extremes have announced a new round of early access for their 2025-bound fantasy action-RPG Soulframe, which I saw a bit of last year and think is pretty promising. They're now adding 2000 players to a Preludes build of the game every week, with each invite email including an additional four invite codes, so you can get your friends involved.
 Read more
articles.title: The Warframe devs want you to come try their luxurious fantasy action-RPG Soulframe

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 has been out for a little while already, what with me giving its multiplayer largely a thumbs up. Still, it's an ever-evolving thing and Activision have announced the game's first seasonal drop. It's a hefty one with a lot of additions, so I'll try my best to break down the good stuff. TLDR: there's some new maps for multiplayer and zombies, new modes, and a few extra bits. I'm mildly excited for more. More in this case is good.
Read more
articles.title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6's first multiplayer season promises new maps, modes, and a hefty Hand Cannon

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
"The cool thing about bombs is that you can hide them in anything," is probably my favourite Oppenheimer quote of all time, and in the case of Ian Hitman, it does raise an important question: with so many everyday objects equal to the rubber duck in its unthreatening aura, yet more inconspicuous, why choose to put an explosive in this one?
The simplest answer is that’s it’s a recurring bit of levity, a holdover easter egg, elevated to the status of key mission item in Hitman: Codename 47 before being given pride of place as an explosive in the World Of Assassination games. But to ascribe such unassuming purpose to the duck is to ignore its revelatory power. We must go deeper.
Read more
articles.title: Object-ive Review: Hitman’s rubber duck

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Palworld developers Pocketpair have finally revealed which patents Nintendo and the Pokémon Company are suing them about. It looks like they're focusing on the act of throwing capsular items to catch or release monsters, together with the usage of monsters as mounts.
If you've somehow yet to encounter Palworld, it's a bestselling survival game that takes hefty - some would say, scandalous - inspiration from Pokémon, with players poaching Pokésque critters using magic spheres, and deploying them as soldiers and minions.
  
Read more
articles.title: Here are the patents Nintendo and the Pokémon Company are suing Palworld about, according to Pocketpair

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
In all honesty, Toads Of The Bayou could have been several notches less ribbet-ing than its Steam demo ended up being, because its stylised pixel fly-snatchers are just that good. There’s only one of the three characters available in the freebie (one of the others is a toad nun with a shotgun), but he’s got a little cutlass, a flintlock pistol, and a can-do attitude - at least when it comes to either stabbing or shooting things. The game itself is a little bit deckbuilder, a little bit Into The Breach: turn based strategy with perfect information and various tricks you can pull to make enemies hit each other instead of the thing you’re trying to protect. Indulge yourself on the gourmet tray-tray below.
Read more
articles.title: Toads Of The Bayou is Into The Breach but with aristocratic, pipe smokin’ toads (of the bayou)

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
Amplitude Studios, developers of many a game with "Endless" in the name, have split with publisher Sega to become independent again, with ownership of the studio reverting to its original founders and "other members of the team". The developers say everyone is parting "on good terms" and that the last eight years of getting published under Sega has been "amazing". But there are other businessy reasons, of course. Namely, Sega have been trying to trim down their European studios for the past year, and Amplitude is just the latest bunch of devs affected by that.
Read more
articles.title: Sega sell off studio behind Endless Legend and Humankind as part of "restructuring" - but it goes to the original owners

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
GeForce Now, Nvidia’s PC-focused game streaming service, will begin calling time on its most muscular of power users. A post on the GFN subreddit announced the introduction of a 100-hour monthly cap (or "allowance"), effective from January 1st 2025 for anyone who signs up after that date. Existing streamists, or anyone who signs up by the end of 2024, will get a year’s grace period before the limit kicks in from January 2026.
Read more
articles.title: Nvidia are slapping a 100-hour monthly cap on GeForce Now streaming, with charges for extra time

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Could tower defence be the ultimate "it's Friday and I am here in body only" genre? I haven't really thought about it before, but Rift Riff's effusively laidback crowd control has me pondering those optimal moments in any tower defender when the incoming horde hits the flamer-MG triangle just right, and you can settle back comfortably into the role of clockwatcher.
Rift Riff encourages this behaviour by being nice to look at. Created by a trio of developers including Hidden Folks designer Adriaan de Jongh, it's a world of spacey, sun-carved mountains, forests and monoliths. The towers resemble the sacred architecture of Monument Valley, and the colour scheme and general ambience remind me of Cocoon. There's a demo, if you fancy it.
 Read more
articles.title: The co-creator of magic puzzler Hidden Folks is making a sumptuous, spaced-out tower defender

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
Nostalgia, when you think about it, is bollocks. There has never been a better time than right this second – averaged out, and despite repeated attempts to the contrary, humanity has never been healthier, freer, or more enlightened by knowledge. It’s true of games too. For every by-committee platter of passionless map markers, there are thousands of more personal, more creative, more interesting works, all adding to the decades' worth of great stuff we can still play today.
What isn’t bollocks is the emotional pull that nostalgia, for all its lack of cold, hard reason, still manages to wield inside our warm, squishy brains. Hence, the centrepiece of Apex Legends’ Season 23 update is a mode that recreates the battle royale FPS as it was back in 2019, defaulting back to the original map and weapon arsenal while cutting the 26-strong legend roster to the earliest ten. It’s a Fortnite-style rolling back of the clock, and a passably enjoyable one, but also a reminder that the good old days weren’t always that good.
Read more
articles.title: Apex Legends is revisiting the past, but it should be prouder of its present

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
I first played Taiko no Tatsujin in an arcade (in Japan, because I am very cool), where it's controlled by hitting a recreation of an actual taiko drum. It was fun enough that I wish there was a taiko drum peripheral available for PC now the series is on our platform. 

Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival is out now via Steam, where it offers over 70 songs to drum through, and a subscription service through which to unlock over 700 more. Maybe I should try to get my Donkey Konga drums working on PC, but I'll probably settle for playing it with a gamepad. 

 
Read more
articles.title: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival beats its way onto Steam today, with 70+ songs (and 700 more behind a subscription)

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Roblox is making changes in an attempt to keep younger players safe in the online platform. Beginning later this month, children under the age of 13 will no longer be able to search, discover or play unrated experiences within Roblox, and will be unable to access social hangout experiences.

 
Read more
articles.title: Roblox is limiting access to social hangouts and unrated games for children aged under 13

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Sega are delisting several bundles of 'classic' games from digital stores, along with "select individual" games. On Steam specifically, this adds up to over 60 games in total, including several actual classics including the original Streets Of Rage trilogy, Crazy Taxi, and Jet Set Radio. 

The games will be removed on December 6th but will remain playable to those who already own them.

 
Read more
articles.title: Sega are delisting over 60 'classic' games from Steam, including Crazy Taxi and Streets Of Rage

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Life simulation game Inzoi will launch on PC via Steam early access on 28th March 2025, publishers Krafton have announced. Billed as a potential Sims 4 usurper, and equipped with syrupy Unreal Engine 5 visuals, it was originally slated for launch this year.
 Read more
articles.title: Offensively good-looking Sims challenger Inzoi hits early access in March 2025

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Back in the mists of 2021, No Man's Sky revealed its very own Normandy SR1 space frigate. "The Normandy in No Man's Sky?" you cry. "Why, that's a Mass Effect vessel. Some mistake here surely?" 1) My name's not Shirley, and 2) Indeed it is a Mass Effect ship, but HelloGames struck a time-limited deal with BioWare to create a version for their own space sim.
"Blast, if only I'd noticed this at the time and acquired one," you mourn. "Ah, so many years I have wasted." Be of good cheer, my friend, for No Man's Sky has a Normandy once again, just in time for the latest N7 Day of assorted Mass Effect celebrations. For the next two weeks, you'll be able to get a-hold of it by way of a revised version of 2021's Beachhead Expedition. Tray-tray, away!
 Read more
articles.title: No Man's Sky has a Mass Effect Normandy again, together with new cross-save functionality

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Got an email about this. Looks cool. Is free. “I’ll write about that,” I thought. “I’ll write about that for Rock Paper Shotgun, a place that semi-regularly posts articles about cool and free games.” So here we are. If you’re waiting for the other shoe to drop, assuming the only reason I’d open an article in a superfluous and straightforward manner is because I’m about to deliver some sort of third sentence twist, you’re completely wrong! There’s no twist at all. I’m simply going to deliver some information about the game in a neutral tone. You can find VED: Purification, a free prologue demo to RPG VED, here.
Read more
articles.title: VED: Purification is a free prologue to the full hand-drawn RPG, complete with Stetson hats and Evil Dead trees

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
When multiplayer fishing game Webfishing came out last month, it offered a relaxing hangout zone for cats and dogs. Everything revolves around catching, selling, and collecting the fish that gather in the rivers of a small island. It also lets you customise your character with clothing. Mostly simple hats and shorts, but some options let players celebrate their sexuality, such as a rainbow-adorned t-shirts, or titles that hang above your character which simply say "Trans" or "Bi". All this led one player to complain there was no "Straight" title. So, the developer added one. It costs 10 grand.

 
Read more
articles.title: Some guy complained this fishing game only caters to queer players, so the dev added a "straight" title - it costs $9999

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
A few months ago, the rumour took root that GTA 6's release date would slip back from 2025 to 2026. An anonymous insider averred that studio heads were "worried" about the new open world game's progress - hence, perhaps, Rockstar's decision to mandate a full return to in-office work. Pshaw, say publishers Take-Two CEO. They announced a fall 2025 launch in March and have just doubled down on it in their latest financial briefing, with CEO Strauss Zelnick subsequently going on the tellybox to say that Take-Two are "highly confident in the timing", though he still has nothing to share about GTA 6 on PC.
 Read more
articles.title: GTA 6 release date won't slip to 2026, Take Two assure - they're "highly confident" about fall 2025

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Take-Two Interactive have sold their publishing label Private Division to an unnamed party, along with five of Private Division's "live and unreleased titles". The GTA 6 publisher have also finally confirmed that they have shut down OlliOlli World and Rollerdrome devs Roll7 together with Kerbal Space Program 2 creators Intercept Games, months after performing mass layoffs at both studios.
 Read more
articles.title: Take-Two are selling Private Division and closing Roll7 and Intercept, because they're in "the business of making great big hits"

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
The dominion of hated Super Earth threatens to expand afresh as Arrowhead CEO Johan Pilestedt toys openly with the prospect of Helldivers 2 cross-over games, beginning with tabletop wargame Trench Crusade and extending to, well, take your pick. Arrowhead's appetite for other licenses appears insatiable. It's the kind of sheer expansionism you'd expect from Earth's loathsome regime, whose "managed democracy" propaganda continues to enthrall thousands of hapless disposable imperialists. Pilestedt even wants to make a Fifth Element game! Milla Jovovich is spinning in her grave. Milla Jovovich isn't dead, you say? Well, that's good news at least.
 
Read more
articles.title: Helldivers 2 boss would "love to do a take" on Star Wars, Predator and Warhammer 40,000

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
When I was a competitive long-distance runner at school, breath control was paramount. We were never really taught this, mind. It was an art you picked up through practice: how to breathe before the race, saturating your blood with O2 without dizzying yourself; when to permit the shorter, emergency breaths and when to apply restraint; when to deepen your inhales and charge yourself up for an attack on a hill.
And then, how to organise your body around your breath, straightening your posture to expand your lungs without tipping back too far and squandering muscle power; how to breath in time with your stride and the movement of your shoulders, so as to firm up your momentum and shave a miraculous-feeling minute off your finishing time. All this, plus various daft psychological war gambits of my own devising. When overtaking or being overtaken, I used to seal my lips shut on that side and breath through the other corner of my mouth, to make it look like I was hardly out of breath at all.
 
Read more
articles.title: Mask Quest review: the cops don't have to breathe

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Calling a game ‘no frills’ or ‘no nonsense’ is always a back-handed compliment, because it sounds like you're saying it's a bit straightforward and simple. And yes, that’s exactly what I’m saying here. Acts Of Blood feels like a spiffy PS2 action brawler; a slightly tighter old Yakuza game, or a stripped-back Sifu. It’s snacky and a bit janky, but it’s also great coffee break fodder, assuming you want to spend your break breaking a selection of heavy objects over the crumbly skulls of ne’er-do-wells. I mean, they might have done some things well, I don’t know them. But they aren’t doing any well to my character in the game, so violence it is.
Read more
articles.title: The Raid homage Acts Of Blood is Sifu’s jankier, snackier cousin

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
There must be hundreds of typewriters in the hall, their collective clacks a tidal wave of soulless automation, rising up to greet agent Kiran Estevez as she enters, pistol and flashlight in hands. Exploring rooms to the side, Alan Wake 2: The Lake House’s star finds whiteboards and documents revealing the typewriter’s purpose: to mimic Wake’s writing. Pages are graded along criteria such as ‘style’, ‘tone’, and ‘content’, then “fed into the algorithm” as references until “near-identical stories” to Wake’s can be produced.
“If Jules could simply cut the painter open and pull the painting out of him, he would,” reads one of the real Alan’s typewritten pages. That’s Jules Marmont, the obsessive head of the titular FBC centre. The Marmonts - Jules and his wife Diana - are running experiments to forcibly and synthetically create works of art, aiming to mimic creative passion convincingly enough for the paranatural entity inside Cauldron Lake to respond, as it has in the past.
Read more
articles.title: Alan Wake 2’s The Lake House is a dark, brilliant parable on the devaluation of art and artists

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Putting aside my natural annoyance at Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater for almost beating out the Twarhammer series in the headline real estate wars, I am more than a little excited to play. Some days, you simply must feast on a tree frog, and while we still don’t have a solid release date, that day doesn’t feel too far away. Good news for stealth fans, and perhaps gooder news for a dozen strapline writers sweating profusely, soiling themselves in anticipation of using “kept you waiting, huh?”.
Until then, I at least have a steady drip feed of new information to keep me sated, the latest of which is the substantial hint that there'll be some new dialogue in the game, as per the video below. Alongside that, the previously pseudonymous Suzetta Miñet - who was credited with voicing EVA in MGS3 and Peace Walker - has revealed herself to be Jodi Benson, the voice of Ariel in Disney’s The Little Mermaid. Cheers for the spot, Automaton West.
Read more
articles.title: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater will have new dialogue, and EVA’s actor reveals why she chose a pseudonym based on her pet dog

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Spor USA s Googlem a jeho mnoho-chapadlovým monopolem nad internetem se posouvá do horké fáze. Ministerstvo spravedlnosti spouští proces, na jehož konci možná přestane existovat Google / Alphabet, jak jej známe.
articles.title: Google se musí zbavit Chrome, Androidu a monopolu na vyhledávání, požaduje Ministerstvo spravedlnosti USA

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Bařina)
articles.description: Komprese dat je postup, který má za cíl zmenšit objem nebo datový tok dat. Tento článek se věnuje výhradně bezeztrátové kompresi, kde lze původní data zrekonstruovat bez zkreslení. Jaké metody můžeme použít?
articles.title: Srovnání linuxových kompresorů dat: různé kompresní poměry a rychlost

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Dnes si vysvětlíme algoritmy pro vektorizaci jazykového korpusu, což je proces, při kterém se z jednotlivých textových dokumentů (každý dokument je představován řetězcem) konstruuje matice s numerickými hodnotami.
articles.title: Využití knihovny scikit-learn pro zpracování a analýzu přirozeného jazyka (NLP), 2.část

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jiří Eischmann)
articles.description: Když Apple uvedl vlastní čipsety pro své počítače, linuxová komunita rozjela projekt Asahi Linux a začala pracovat na tom, aby na tomto hardwaru běžel i Linux. V jakém stavu je projekt po čtyřech letech?
articles.title: Asahi Linux na počítači od Apple: podpora hardware po čtyřech letech

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Sonda do světa otevřeného softwaru. Dnes si na Linuxu otevřeme e-maily z Outlooku, upravíme si animované GIFy, uspořádáme si záložky a vyzkoušíme aplikaci pro zapínání zařízení po síti.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (20. 11. 2024): odkazy na články včetně jejich kopie

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Bařina)
articles.description: GMP (GNU MP nebo též libgmp) je otevřená knihovna pro práci s čísly v libovolně přesné aritmetice, která může pracovat s celými čísly, racionálními čísly a čísly v plovoucí řádové čárce.
articles.title: Knihovna GMP: aritmetika s neomezenou přesností

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Při programování IBM PC je třeba zajistit volání nějakého podprogramu v pravidelných intervalech. Realizace formou čekacích smyček je většinou nepraktická, proto je výhodnější využít časovač představovaný čipem 8253.
articles.title: Časovač 8253 a systém přerušení na IBM PC

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: CSIRT.CZ)
articles.description: Podíváme se na ukrývání kódu v metadatech, na zranitelnost ve Windows zneužitelnou pouhým kliknutím pravého tlačítka myši, opět se budeme věnovat ransomwaru, zaměříme se také na škodlivý balíček fabrice a zranitelnosti v GitLabu.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: pašování škodlivého kódu v metadatech souborů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Fedora 42 povýší spin s prostředím KDE Plasma na edici. Operační systém FreeBSD bootuje na telefonu PinePhone Pro. Týmu projektu Redox OS se podařilo systém Redox spustit na počítači Raspberry Pi 4.
articles.title: Fedora KDE Plasma povýší na edici, FreeBSD bootuje na na PinePhone Pro

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: SDL3 nastavuje podporu Steam Controlleru jako aktivní, nová verze digiKam 8.5.0 vylepšuje detekci a rozpoznávání tváří, KDE opravuje spoustu chyb, pracuje na lepším běhu v HDR režimu.
articles.title: Končící výroba Apple Vision Pro, AMD ZenDNN 5.0 s podporou nových CPU EPYC

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Včera vyšla verze 8.4.1 programovacího jazyka PHP. Mezi novinky patří háčky vlastností, nesymetrická viditelnost, líné objekty a #[\Deprecated].
articles.title: Nové PHP 8.4.1: háčky vlastností, nesymetrická viditelnost a líné objekty

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Loki je nástroj na sběr, ukládaní a prohlížení logu. Je to nástroj od Grafany, takže je s ní přímo integrovaná. Připravili jsme pro vás nové školení Loki – Log management v Grafaně, na kterém se naučíte nasadit Loki Stack (Loki, Grafana a Promtail) a budete do něj schopni ukládat logy. Dále se naučíte, jak logy prohledávat, ukážeme si, jak nastavit retenci logu i jak nad daty z logu dělat dashboardy a alerting.
articles.title: Loki: log management v Grafaně (školeni)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Do jádra 6.13 se ve středu dostala podpora pro SDUC (Secure Digital Ultra Capacity) karty s kapacitou 2–128 TB. Formát SDUC byl poprvé oznámen v roce 2018, rozšiřuje formát SDXC pro kapacity nad 2 TB.
articles.title: Jádro 6.13 přidává podporu pro SD karty 2–128 TB

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Dnes je tomu 29 let od chvíle, kdy tehdejší student na Berkeley, Peter Mattis, oznámil projekt GIMP, tehdy ještě General Image Manipulation Program, nyní GNU Image Manipulation Program, ale stále GIMP.
articles.title: GIMP oslavil 29 let

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: V balíčku Needrestart, který je ve výchozím nastavení nainstalován například v Ubuntu Serveru od verze 21.04, bylo odhaleno několik velmi starých bezpečnostních chyb, které lokálnímu útočníkovi umožňují získat práva roota bez nutnosti interakce s uživatelem.
articles.title: Bezpečnostní chyba v balíčku Needrestart umožňuje ovládnout systém

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Spolu s dále rozvinutou obecnou podporu běhu Linuxu na Raspberry Pi 5, která se objevila v jádru 6.12, přinese následné jádro 6.13 též podporu Raspberry Pi Camera Front-End (CFE) pomocí příslušného ovladče. Za jeho vývojem stojí přímo Raspberry Pi a Ideas on Board. Ovladač se postará jak o samotnou podporu hardwarového bloku CFE a zpracování signálu, tak MIPI D-PHY a MIPI CSI-2.
articles.title: Jádro Linux 6.13 přinese podporu Raspberry Pi Camera Front End

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Superpočítač El Capitan je novým králem světového žebříčku. Tento stroj s více než 11 milióny CPU jader v podobě procesorů EPYC generace Zen 4 v kombinaci s „GPU“ AMD Instinct MI300A dosahuje při spotřebě 29,58 MW výkonu 1,742, resp. 2,746 EFLOPS (Rmax, resp. Rpeak). Dodala jej společnost HPE, operačním systémem je TOSS (Tri-Lab Operating System Stack stavějící na RHELu).
articles.title: Žebříček TOP 500: El Capitan s CPU+GPU AMD vede, Intel až na třetím místě

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: johny)
articles.description: Dňa 12. novembra bola vydaná vývojová platforma .NET vo verzii 9 v rámci ktorej jazyk C# prešiel na verziu 13 a dočkal sa niekoľkých menších noviniek .
articles.title: Novinky v C# 13

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Po 13 letech od předchozí verze 1.3 vydali tvůrci novou verzi frameworku FLTK 1.4, alias Fast Light Toolkit, známý například z rozhraní projektu CinePaint. V éře všemožných Wayland kompozitorů jde sice o velmi neobvyklou událost, avšak ukazující silnou stránku open-source: i řešení, která se léty stala v podstatě obskurními, mohou nadále žít a adaptovat se na nový svět, zde tedy primárně ten Waylandový.
articles.title: FLTK 1.4 s podporou Waylandu a HiDPI

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Linux je v síťovém prostředí jako doma, může zastat prakticky všechny potřebné role od směrovače (router), přes DHCP, DNS až po souborový server Samba pro Microsoft Windows. Přijďte se to všechno naučit na naše třídenní školení s názvem Linux: správa počítačové sítě.
articles.title: Linux a správa počítačové sítě (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vydání Debianu 13 „Trixie“ je naplánováno na rok 2025 a právě probíhá hlasování o výchozím motivu pracovního prostředí. Jonathan Carter oznámil zveřejnění jednotlivých vzhledů a připomněl blížící se termín vydání. I když ještě nemáme oficiální data zmrazení, mohu vás ujistit, že se blíží! A s tím přichází čas vývojového cyklu, kdy je třeba vybrat grafiku pracovní plochy, která bude použita v příštím vydání Debianu, píše Carter.
articles.title: Debian volí vzhled desktopu pro chystanou verzi Trixie

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Před týdnem vyšel RHEL 9.5, včera jsme psali o AlmaLinuxu 9.5 a nyní vyšel také Rocky Linux 9.5. Přináší stejné novinky jako jeho kolegové, je tu tedy Podman 5.0, Cockpit má modul pro správu souborů a byla aktualizována řada balíčků.
articles.title: Vyšel Rocky Linux 9.5

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Po více než dvaceti letech vývoje komunita okolo projektu FreeCAD oznámila vydání verze 1.0. Nová verze přináší řadu vylepšení uživatelského rozhraní, nový systém materiálů, integrovanou pracovní plochu pro montáže, nový kód pro řešení problémů s topologickým pojmenováním a další změny.
articles.title: Vyšel FreeCAD 1.0 s vylepšeným uživatelským rozhraním a novým systémem materiálů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: uxes)
articles.description: Na crowdfundingové službě Indiegogo je k dispozici kampaň pro telefon BraX3, který mimo Android bude možné zakoupit s mobilním systémem Ubuntu Touch. Jedná se o nástupce staršího telefonu BraX2.
articles.title: BraX3: modulární telefon s Ubuntu Touch na Indiegogo

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Nová verze 3D animačního nástroje Blender 4.3 je na světě. Potěší zejména majitele rychlých novějších Radeonů, kterým konečně nabídne podporu ray-tracingu přes rozhraní AMD HIP-RT, a to jak pro Windows, tak Linux. Experimentální novinkou této verze pak je možnost renderovat rozhraní programu přes API Vulkan. Výchozím je zatím i nadále OpenGL.
articles.title: Vyšel Blender 4.3 s podporou AMD HIP-RT a vykreslováním UI přes Vulkan

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Začalo to jako aprílový žert, ale společnost SilverStone, specialista na skříně, chlazení a napájení, oznámila, že do prodeje míří retro skříň FLP01 pro stolní počítače. Skříň už byla viděna na Japan Expo a japonská technická média uvádějí, že bude uvedena na trh někdy v prvním čtvrtletí roku 2025 zhruba za 130 dolarů, tedy asi 3100 korun.
articles.title: SilverStone FLP01 je retro PC skříň pro moderní stolní počítač

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Společnost Blizzard Entertainment poprvé vydala hru World of Warcraft v listopadu roku 2004, slavíme tedy dvacet let její existence. Hra změnila navždy svět počítačových her a okamžitě uchvátila miliony hráčů po celém světě. Co ji ale dělá tak výjimečnou, je její schopnost spojit lidi napříč kontinenty, nabídnout jim obrovské a živé světy k prozkoumání a hluboký příběh, který se neustále vyvíjí. Každé rozšíření přidávalo nové prvky a příběhové linky, které hráče stále motivovaly k návratu.
articles.title: World of Warcraft slaví 20 let a stále se hraje

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Podle serveru Android Authority společnost Google údajně pracuje na velkém projektu migrace operačního systému Chrome OS do systému Android s cílem sjednotit své operační systémy a lépe konkurovat tabletům iPad. Tento přechod zahrnuje začlenění funkcí systému Chrome OS, jako jsou rozšíření a podpora linuxových aplikací, do systému Android. Nadcházející aktualizace se prý zaměří na zlepšení funkčnosti stolních počítačů a kompatibility zařízení.
articles.title: Google prý chce Chrome OS změnit na Android

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Výkonný ředitel společnosti Framework Nirav Patel předvedl na Ubuntu Summitu velmi odvážnou technologickou ukázku, kdy naživo upravil notebook Framework z architektury x86 na RISC-V. Během pěti minut otevřel počítač Framework, vyjmul z něj základní desku, nainstaloval jinou desku poháněnou RISC-V, znovu ji připojil a stroj opět zavřel. To vše při živé prezentaci a v podstatě bez zaváhání, jak můžete vidět ve videozáznamu.
articles.title: Modulární notebooky Framework dostávají desku s RISC-V

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Ubuntu 25.04 na jaře příštího roku přinese přechod na optimalizace kompilátorů -O3. Vedle toho vývojáři Canonicalu testují i Profile Guided Optimizations (PGO), které když se dobře udělají, mohou dle aktuálních měření přinést další 5% až 7% zrychlení systému.
articles.title: Ubuntu zkouší PGO, zrychlení systému o 5 až 7 % v ideální situaci a RISC-V

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Nadace FreeBSD oznámila vydání zprávy o bezpečnostním auditu hypervizoru Bhyve a bezpečnostního frameworku Capsicum, který provedla bezpečnostní firma Synacktiv. Bezpečnostní audit [PDF] odhalil celkem 27 zranitelností a problémů v různých subsystémech FreeBSD. Sedm problémů nebylo možné zneužít a výsledkem je spíše zlepšení robustnosti nebo kvality kódu než o bezprostřední bezpečnostní problémy.
articles.title: FreeBSD zveřejnilo bezpečnostní audit nástrojů Bhyve a Capsicum

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vývojáři uvolnili nový AlmaLinux s označením 9.5 a kódovým jménem Teal Serval. Zaměřuje se na zlepšení výkonu, vývojových nástrojů a zabezpečení. Nové verze kompilátorů poskytují přístup k nejnovějším funkcím a optimalizacím, které zvyšují výkon a umožňují lepší generování kódu. K dispozici jsou GCC 14, LLVM 18.1.8, Rust 1.79.0, Go 1.22, GCC 11.5, a Annobin 12.70.
articles.title: AlmaLinux 9.5 vylepšuje výkon, vývojové nástroje a zabezpečení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Operační systém pro jednodeskové počítače Raspberry Pi vyšel dnes s označením 2024–11–13. Novinkou je zvětšení výchozího swap souboru na 512 MB.  Soubor /etc/rc.local dříve ukazoval IP adresu, nyní se tato funkce přesunula do  /etc/issue.d/IP.issue.
articles.title: Raspberry Pi OS 2024-11-13 s větším swapem

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: PeoplePath)
articles.description: Dne 27. listopadu 2024 od 18:00 společnost PeoplePath pořádá IT workshop s názvem "The One Billion Row Challenge - je PHP rychlejší než Java?". Akce se koná v salonku v 1. patře v restauraci U Salzmannů v Plzni. Drobné občerstvení a nápoje jsou samozřejmostí a vstupné je zdarma.
articles.title: ITWorkshop v Plzni: The One Billion Row Challenge - je PHP rychlejší než Java?

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Pokud chcete provozovat Kubernetes na vlastním hardware, Rancher je jednoduchý a efektivní způsob, jak toho docílit. Umožní vám jednoduše vytvořit a spravovat Kubernets cluster na vlastních virtuálních serverech. Používat Rancher se naučíte na dalším školení Rancher – Kubernetes na vlastním hardware, které proběhne 25. a 26. listopadu a uskuteční se online.
articles.title: Rancher: provozujte Kubernetes na vlastním hardware (školení)

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Podivná neutronová hvězda vyvolává nejistotu. Dvě vrstvy atomů dostali do blízkosti 50 nanometrů. Práškový diamant by mohl v magnetické rezonanci nahradit gadolinium. Syntéza kvalitního grafenu vyžaduje prostředí bez stop kyslíku.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Vědci dokázali vyladit Casimirovu sílu pomocí magnetického pole

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Pomocí DNA vyrobili diamantové fotonické krystaly. Obětí phishing útoků se v posledním roce stalo až 80 % organizací kritické infrastruktury. AWS Cloud Day Prague 2024. Synology Experience Day 2024. Pure Storage zjednodušuje migraci podnikových prostředí VMware do cloudu Microsoft Azure. Chris Keller z AWS přiblížil na Cloud Day Prague novinky.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Obětí phishing útoků se v posledním roce stalo až 80 % organizací kritické infrastruktury

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Chemie ultratěžkých prvků moscovia (115) a nihonia (113) má souviset s relativistickými efekty. Navrhují vznik temné energie v černých dírách. Kvantové provázání přežije i chemickou reakci. Ničení nebezpečných objektů jejich stáhnutím do atmosféry. Temná hmota by mohla hvězdám zajistit nesmrtelnost.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Magický grafen může být supravodivý jen do 60 K

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 46/2024

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Máme zde výprodej na Black Friday a ceny od Dckeyoffer jsou opravdu skvělé když sháníte originální doživotní licence na Windows. Během výprodeje na Black Friday máme vysoké slevy na platné licence na Windows a Office. Zejména klíč na Windows 11 je dnes nejžádanější, tak na co čekat?
articles.title: Při výprodeji Black Friday je doživotní licence Windows 11 jen za €20, za Office €24

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Přehled říjnových vydání Jaderných novin: stav vydání jádra, citáty týdne a seznam článků týkajících se jádra.
articles.title: Jaderné noviny – přehled za říjen 2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Umělá inteligence zvyšuje náklady na datová centra, hlavně kvůli spotřebě elektřiny. Hospodářská komora: Zákon o kybernetické bezpečnosti výrazně zvýší náklady pro firmy. Global Mobile Broadband Forum 2024: 5.5G a AI jako základ nové éry mobilní komunikace. Digitální podnikové služby v Česku nabírají na síle: 175 tisíc zaměstnanců, robotizace a nové investice táhnou růst. Dell Technologies rozšiřuje portfolio Dell AI Factory o nové servery PowerEdge. Agentforce od Salesforce: důvěryhodní, autonomní agenti s umělou inteligencí posilují pracovní síly ve firmách.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Umělá inteligence zvyšuje náklady na datová centra, hlavně kvůli spotřebě elektřiny

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Matematiku a přírodní vědu prý spojuje stejná role náhodných procesů a pravděpodobnosti. Opice, Shakespeare a Rossův–Littlewoodův paradox. Vědci odhalili původ meteoritů dopadajících na Zemi.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Že by za Fermiho paradox mohla umělá inteligence?

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 45/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: HP Wolf Security: nové důkazy o útocích prostřednictvím malwaru generovaného AI. Matrix odhalí kvalitu a efektivitu agilního vývoje. Platformové inženýrství může naplnit přísliby přístupu DevOps. Úloha AI v řízení finančních rizik v Evropě. V grafenu poprvé detektovali elektronové víry. Asseco představuje širokou škálu inovací v rámci své mezinárodní skupiny.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: V grafenu poprvé detektovali elektronové víry

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Robotický lovec s umělou inteligencí ochrání kritickou infrastrukturu před útoky dronů . Antihmota v kosmickém záření znovu otevírá otázku temné hmoty v podobě části WIMP. Asteroid, který vyhubil dinosaury, mohl současně odstartovat zemědělství mravenců.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Sonda Psyche opět posunula rekord v laserové komunikaci

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Společnost PINE64 stojící za telefony PinePhone nebo notebooky Pinebook publikovala na svém blogu listopadový souhrn novinek. Představena byla nová kamerka PineCam a nová deska Yuzuki Avaota-A1. Čtečka PineNote je v prodeji za 399 dolarů.
articles.title: Novinky od PINE64 - 11/2024

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: V srpnu loňského roku byl souborový systém ReiserFS v Linuxu označen jako obsolete. K plánovanému odstranění ReiserFS z Linuxu se v lednu (komiks) vyjádřil i Hans Reiser z vězení. Včera Linus Torvalds tento souborový systém ze zdrojových kódů upstream Linuxu odstranil (commit). V Linuxu 6.13 už nebude.
articles.title: ReiserFS z upstream Linuxu odstraněn

articles.author: Fluttershy, yay!
articles.description: Firma Proxmox vydala distribuci Virtual Environment ve verzi 8.3. Podrobnosti v poznámkách k vydání.
articles.title: Proxmox Virtual Environment 8.3

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Tisková zpráva Rady pro rozhlasové a televizní vysílání: Fyzické osoby, které vytvářejí audiovizuální mediální obsah (např. vloggeři, influenceři) a nabízejí jej na platformách typu Instagram, Facebook, TikTok apod., a pokud jimi poskytovaná služba naplňuje definiční kritéria audiovizuální mediální služby na vyžádání, jsou povinni oznámit poskytovaní služby dozorovému orgánu, kterým je v ČR Rada pro rozhlasové a televizní vysílání.
articles.title: Povinnost evidence tvůrců audiovizuálního mediálního obsahu

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána nová major verze 8.4 (8.4.1) skriptovacího jazyka PHP používaného zejména k vývoji dynamických webových stránek. Přináší řadu novinek a vylepšení. Vydána byla také příručka pro přechod z předchozích verzí.
articles.title: PHP 8.4

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Předseda Úřadu pro ochranu hospodářské soutěže Petr Mlsna potvrdil pokutu milion korun pro ministerstvo pro místní rozvoj za chybné zadání digitalizace stavebního řízení mimo tendr. Rozhodnutí je pravomocné, uvedl úřad ve čtvrtek v tiskové zprávě.
articles.title: Potvrzena pokuta milion korun za chybné zadání digitalizace stavebního řízení

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: GIMP má dnes narozeniny, my máme přání jediný, … (𝕏, Mastodon). Představen byl před 29 lety, 21. listopadu 1995.
articles.title: GIMP má dnes 29. narozeniny

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Americké ministerstvo spravedlnosti chce, aby internetový gigant Google prodal prohlížeč Chrome a omezil upřednostňování svého vyhledávače v systému Android. Podle agentury Reuters to ministerstvo navrhlo soudu, aby tak rozbilo monopol Googlu v online vyhledávání a související reklamě. Agentura poznamenala, že Google bude mít v prosinci možnost předložit vlastní návrhy.
articles.title: Google by měl prodat prohlížeč Chrome, navrhla vláda USA

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: V utilitě needrestart bylo nalezeno a v upstream verzi 3.8 opraveno 5 bezpečnostních chyb (CVE-2024-48990, CVE-2024-48991, CVE-2024-48992, CVE-2024-10224 a CVE-2024-11003) využitelných k lokální eskalaci práv. Utilita needrestart je ve výchozím nastavení nainstalována například na Ubuntu Serverech od verze 21.04 (USN-7117-1).
articles.title: 5 bezpečnostních chyb v utilitě needrestart

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Při vydání Windows 10 před devíti lety se hodně řešila důvěrnost dat. Zasílání osobních dat na servery Microsoftu a sledování uživatelů bylo ve světě Windows novinkou. Aeronet tenkrát publikoval hodně probíraný článek tvrdící, že Windows 10 jsou "ve svém principu pouhý terminál na sběr informací o uživateli, jeho prstech, očích a hlasu". Svět IT se od té doby hodně změnil. Spousta firemních počítačů je dnes s Windows 365 přímo v cloudu. Uživatelé ale pořád mají "osobní počítače". Microsoft by to rád změnil. Představil zařízení Windows 365 Link, což je v reálu "pouhý terminál" bez operačního systému, který se umí jenom připojit k Windows 365. Dostupný bude v dubnu 2025 za 349 dolarů.
articles.title: Windows 365 Link

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: In addition to the pull requests managed by Microsoft engineer Christian Brauner for VFS untorn writes for atomic writes with XFS and EXT4, Tmpfs case insensitive file/folder support, new Rust file abstractions, and the renewed multi-grain timestamps work, another interesting Linux 6.13 pull submitted by Brauner revolves around VFS file enhancements...
articles.title: Nice File Performance Optimizations Coming With Linux 6.13

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The Direct Rendering Manager (DRM) subsystem updates have been submitted for the Linux 6.13 merge window in bringing many updates to the open-source kernel graphics/display drivers as well as the accelerator subsystem...
articles.title: Faster Raspberry Pi Graphics & Intel Xe3 Enablement Starts With Linux 6.13 DRM Changes

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Linus Torvalds just merged the change to the Linux 6.13 kernel that goes ahead and deletes the ReiserFS file-system from the source tree. Removing ReiserFS from the Linux tree lightens the kernel by 32.8k lines of code...
articles.title: ReiserFS Has Been Deleted From The Linux Kernel

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Mesa 24.3 has managed to make it out today, one week ahead of the previous release plans due to the lack of any major blocker bugs appearing. Mesa 24.3 has a lot of new feature work on the contained open-source Vulkan drivers as well as evolutionary improvements to their OpenGL drivers and other user-space 3D driver code...
articles.title: Mesa 24.3 Released With Many Open-Source Vulkan Driver Improvements

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The four pull requests adding various SoC and board/platform support have now been merged for the Linux 6.13 kernel. This includes support for many older Apple iPad/iPhones, supporting another SoC with a combination of RISC-V and ARM cores, and a wide variety of other mostly ARM hardware support...
articles.title: Linux 6.13 SoC Updates Land With Initial Support For Many Older Apple Devices

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Zrythm 1.0 released today as a big milestone for this open-source digital audio workstation (DAW) software that caters from professional users down to beginners...
articles.title: Zrythm 1.0 Released For Powerful Open-Source Digital Audio Workstation

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: On top of an exciting Vulkan spec update out today, The Khronos Group has announced the Slang Initiative based on NVIDIA's open-source Slang compiler code...
articles.title: Khronos Announces Slang Initiative From Open-Source NVIDIA Code

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Ahead of the upcoming freeze for Wine 10.0, VKD3D 1.14 is now available for this prominent Wine component that allows Direct3D 12 to be implemented over the Vulkan API for enhancing Windows games/apps running on Linux and other platforms...
articles.title: VKD3D 1.14 Released With Initial Metal Shading Language Output

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The Error Detection And Correction (EDAC) subsystem updates landed this week for the ongoing Linux 6.13 kernel merge window...
articles.title: Linux 6.13 EDAC Preps For Panther Lake H & Missing Support For Old Kabylake S CPUs

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: PHP 8.4 is out today as the newest annual major feature release to this widely-used scripting language...
articles.title: PHP 8.4 Released With Property Hooks, Lazy Objects & Other New Features

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Vulkan 1.3.302 was published this morning with a handful of new extensions, including AV1 encode support for Vulkan Video...
articles.title: Vulkan 1.3.302 Published With AV1 Encode & NVIDIA Display Stereo Extensions

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: While the Bcachefs feature changes for Linux 6.13 were already submitted even before the Linux 6.12 stable kernel was released, merging these changes are supposedly on hold due to the kernel's Code of Conduct (CoC) board...
articles.title: Bcachefs Changes Rejected Reportedly Due To CoC, Kernel Future "Uncertain"

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Linux 6.13 has merged support for the Secure Digital Ultra Capacity "SDUC" standard for 2TB to 128TB storage capacity SD cards...
articles.title: Linux 6.13 Adds Support For Ultra Capacity SD Cards "SDUC" For 2TB To 128TB Storage

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Andrew Morton on Monday submitted all the memory management "MM" related patches for the Linux 6.13 merge window. As usual there's a lot of interesting performance optimizations and other low-level refinements...
articles.title: Linux 6.13 "MM" Patches Bring Some Enticing Performance Optimizations

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The abundance of networking subsystem updates have been mailed in for the Linux 6.13 kernel from wired and wireless driver enhancements to core networking code improvements...
articles.title: Many Networking Changes In Linux 6.13 - One Line Of Code Helping WireGuard Performance

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: As I wrote about last week within the Supermicro H13SSL-N EPYC Turin motherboard review, one of the factors leading me to purchasing that EPYC 9005 series motherboard was that this board offered support for full 12 channel DDR5-6000 memory performance compared to some of the other lower-cost Socket SP5 motherboards offering just 8 memory channels. For those wanting to quantify the performance difference between eight and twelve memory channels with AMD EPYC 9005 "Turin" processors, here are some benchmarks for showing the workloads that can really benefit from all 12 memory channels and other workloads where eight memory channels can be largely sufficient if looking to minimize costs.
articles.title: 8 vs. 12 Channel DDR5-6000 Memory Performance With AMD 5th Gen EPYC

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Following the initial Raspberry Pi 5 upstream support in Linux 6.12 providing basic support, an exciting Raspberry Pi addition with the in-development Linux 6.13 kernel is introducing a Raspberry Pi Camera Front-End "CFE" driver...
articles.title: Raspberry Pi Camera Front End "CFE" Video Capture With Linux 6.13

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The in-development Linux 6.13 kernel is bringing a lot of exciting improvements for AMD Linux customers...
articles.title: Many AMD CPU Feature Additions Land In Linux 6.13

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Intel's open-source software developers released today OpenVINO 2024.5 as the newest major feature release for this cross-platform AI toolkit...

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
If you're looking to improve your Ultimate Team squad without spending any resources in EA FC 25, the Richarlison Moments and Joao Felix Flashback cards could be worth your interest.


They're part of the newly-released FC Pro Live: Champions Finals, which is now available in Ultimate Team. It's a relatively simple objective set with just two tasks. While completing it might be challenging for some, you can unlock a useful pack and two great cards in the process.


How to get Richarlison Moments in EA FC 25


You'll have to complete only a single task if you want to obtain the special card of the Brazilian attacker. You have a couple of Champions Finals runs to pull off 10 wins in total. However, only the Finals matches will be considered, so you'll have to finish the Playoffs successfully. Once done, you'll be able to try your luck in the finals.


This year, qualifying for the Finals itself has been a huge challenge, so getting the item won't be easy. That said, completing 10 wins shouldn't be too complex if you have no problem with the Playoffs. While the card could be better in terms of its in-game stats, roles, and playstyles, it's free and relatively straightforward to unlock. 


How to get Joao Felix Flashback in EA FC 25


Earning the 89-rated Felix Flashback will be a massive challenge. You'll first have to qualify to the Finals, and then win 22 games. That's right, you can have a maximum chance of 30 matches, and winning at least 22 of those is mandatory.


If you've played Champions Finals this year, you'll know just how hard the entire ask is. That said, the card on offer has some amazing in-game stats and will fit in almost every available squad. High Pace, great Shooting, four useful roles, and the Technical+ playstyle - Felix has it all.


It's a shame that obtaining the card can be a really hard job unless you're among the elite-ranked players.

The post EA FC 25: How to get Richarlison Moments and Joao Felix Flashback for free appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: EA FC 25: How to get Richarlison Moments and Joao Felix Flashback for free

articles.author: Chris Penwell
articles.description:
During an interview with the Daily Star, Final Fantasy VII Rebirth director Naoki Hamaguchi confirmed that there are no DLC plans for the second entry of the trilogy. Instead, Square Enix is going full steam ahead with development for the conclusive title of the Final Fantasy VII remake trilogy. 


"I think, from my perspective, what the fans really want to see the most is not necessarily DLC," said Hamaguchi to the Daily Star in a Thursday interview. "They want to see the third part of the series as quickly as possible.”


Image via Square Enix


Hamaguchi explained that they don't want to "focus the development resources on creating additional extra episodes for [Final Fantasy VII Rebirth] DLC at the moment" and get the "third game out as quickly as [they] can" instead.


The first entry in the three-parter, Final Fantasy VII Remake, received an expansion story focusing on new member of the group Yuffie. It introduced her in a new narrative that spans between the first and second parts and was exclusive to the Intergrade version of the game, which had better visuals and a photo mode. Additionally, it made use of the PS5's SSD. 


Unfortunately, Final Fantasy VII Rebirth's sales haven't been the best for Square Enix. While discussing Final Fantasy XVI and Final Fantasy VII Rebirth in a financial report back in May 2024, Square Enix said that "profits unfortunately did not meet [its] expectations."


Hopefully, this doesn't mean the third and final entry in the Final Fantasy VII Remake series won't be rushed. What may help sales, however, is that Final Fantasy VII Rebirth is listed as a nominee for Game of the Year at The Game Awards 2024. 

The post Final Fantasy VII Rebirth will not be getting DLC, says director appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Final Fantasy VII Rebirth will not be getting DLC, says director

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
Following up on the original 2021 announcement, more details have emerged for the Disney Twisted-Wonderland anime. The adaptation of f4samurai and publisher Aniplex's game is now set to premiere in the first of three seasons in October 2025.


That three-season run will start with the "Episode of Heartslabyul" storyline, and the series will stream exclusively on Disney+ (via Crunchyroll News). While dates have yet to be announced, the second and third seasons will be "Episode of Savanaclaw" and "Episode of Octavinelle," respectively.


Accompanying the news was more on the production staff behind it and a brand new key visual. You can see the illustration featuring the seven dorm leaders nicely lined up below.




Takahiro Natori — who previously directed shows like Tokyo Mew Mew New and the Cannon Busters net animation — serves as chief director and is in charge of series composition. Shin Katagai (Eyeshield 21, My Sweet Tyrant) is directing, and Yoichi Kato (Yo-kai Watch, Aikatsu!) is on writing duties.


And those sweet designs from Black Butler creator Yana Toboso that made the game so alluring in the first place? Haruka Nakano and Akane Sato are in charge of adapting them for animation. 


Disney Twisted-Wonderland first launched for mobile devices in Japan back in March 2020, with the English release following in January 2022. It's basically a Villains Academy gacha game full of extremely attractive characters, so an anime adaptation is a total no-brainer. We'll just have to see how long the wait will be between seasons. 

The post Disney Twisted-Wonderland anime kicks off 3-season run in October 2025 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Disney Twisted-Wonderland anime kicks off 3-season run in October 2025

articles.author: Chris Penwell
articles.description:
A Cyberpunk 2077 PS5 Pro patch has been requested by fans of the RPG. However, they may be disappointed as the game's developer CD Projekt Red confirmed on Wednesday that the game won't be optimized for the new console. 


"We currently have no plans for PS5 Pro patch," said the official Cyberpunk 2077 X page (via VGC), responding to a fan asking for optimization for the new system. 


Image via CD Projekt Red


Cyberpunk 2077 currently has a bunch of PS5-specific features already. It supports dynamic 4K resolution scaling, ray-tracing, 3D audio, haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and makes use of the ultra-high speed SSD. The PS5 version also has improved crowd reactions and various visual quality improvements, according to the official PlayStation listing.


The ray-tracing mode, however, only supports 30 frames per second, which the PS5 Pro could possibly remedy if CD Projekt Red gave some time to a port. Thankfully, if you have the PS4 version of the game, physically or digitally, you can upgrade to the PS5 port for free. You can also transfer your PS4 files to the PS5, so you won't lose any progress and finish that lengthy introduction once again.


Despite Cyberpunk 2077 missing out on the PS5 Pro's features, there are many games to support the new console. Action-RPG Lies of P has improved frame rates, and Performance Mode supports a full native 4K resolution. The PS5 Pro also delivers a 40% increase in pixel density, and Lords of the Fallen with Performance Mode gives us 4K resolutions at 60 frames per second. 

The post Cyberpunk 2077 won’t be getting a PS5 Pro patch appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077 won’t be getting a PS5 Pro patch
